title: AJCRIMSON PRO ON THE GO 2015 -NYC
desc: Join AJ Crimson For A Day of Beauty, Signature Tips and Celeb Tricks!? * Lipstick and Dual Skin Creme Foundation are based on shade availblity ( if your shade is not availble at the time of your class you may have it shipped, at our standard shipping rate of 6.95)? * Universal Neutral Set - In Neutral Matte or Bamboo may be selected from availablity during your session.? THE CLASS -? 11:00am - 2pm? :? Our 3 Hour guided lesson will walk you through : WHAT TO BRING: ? Your beautiful smile and fun personality!!? A PERSONAL TABLE TOP MIRROR.? Your Clean Brushes ( Dont worry if you dont have tons, bring what you have) Your Make up Kit ( make up bag, your personal foundations, Eye shadows, blush etc)? Make up Remover/ Wipes *? Make Up Kits and Brushes will NOT be provided for use.? ATTIRE: Please Dress In All Black Business Casual? **OPEN TO THE PUBLIC RSVP REQUIRED No dress code required ** AJCRIMSON POP UP SHOP - 2:30 - 430pm :? For two hours preceeding the class, our pop up shop will be open to the class attendees and the public
